Before laser refractive surgery , patient seat front Zyoptix 100 system platform ( Bausch & Lomb , salt lake city , UT , USA ) receive Zywave aberrometer measurement eye . When patient supine position refractive surgery , infrared camera mount laser system ( Technolas 217z100 excimer laser system , Bausch & Lomb ) obtain iris image undilated pupil laser ablation .
